file_content.text: This is far from over.
Do you think you've won? The Republic's hold on Quesh is at an end.
All of this has been a trap, and you fools walked into it blindly.
I had no idea Jedi were so gullible. All of this has only been a diversion.
While you have been busy playing the good little soldier, you have been outmaneuvered.
I wouldn't expect a common thug to understand, so I'll use small words: You have wasted your time.
While you have been wasting your time here, Republic operations have already been dismantled.
You never had the strength or the courage to strike the Empire down, and you never will.
Captain, restrain this man and escort him to the Republic base.
Take him into custody.
Gladly.
I'm going to start with you.
Watch me. [Kill him]
Good riddance. That Imperial scum got what was coming to him.
You should go on ahead. General Korvan will meet you at the war camp to hear your report in person.
Welcome. I would offer you some of these excellent adrenals, but my warriors have used the last of them.
Surrender, Moff Dracen. I'll see to it that you aren't harmed.
Lay down your weapons.
There's no shortage of adrenals on this planet. I'm practically throwing them away now.
I don't need any, thanks.
Was that a threat?
I hope you realize what an honor you have been given today. You will play a pivotal role in galactic history.
Your deaths will be the final outrage that forces the Republic's hand.
And now, I think it is time to conclude this.
